Guest Comment: A/C unit was disgusting and dirty

The A/C was broken. Hotel is still under construction. We were told everything would be done by June 2017 and we even pre-paid our reservation so we couldn't cancel it. As of November 2018 the construction is still ongoing. This hotel needs a lot of work, you should  stay far away!!
Incredible hotel. Loved the view. Very friendly staff.

First impression not great - the lady at the front desk was a little rude. Our wifi wasn't working and she didn't want to do much to help. The room was amazing though with a beautiful view. The pool was great. Really clean. I would stay again for sure.
At night the A/C was very loud, couldn’t sleep. Switching it off didn't help as we could still hear the neighbors ac..
Beautiful, clean, and convenient. Great ocean view
Beautiful design. The hotel was stunning. Main lobby is very Hawaiian, open air, welcoming party, loved the complimentary mai tais each evening.
It is hard to find the resort. The staff was friendly and helpful. Window air conditioner was noisy. All else was great, comfortable bed, amazing view, spacious living room.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Clean room, older style, 1950ish, needs some remodelling, but the most important thing is of course, location, location, location! !! Near, beach, shopping, restaurants, and, transportation, very convenient! Awesome, place, to stay, if you don't mind having big hotel luxury, but your in Hawaii, so you'll be out everyday, enjoying, so save money and stay here!!

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Clean, good location, fast WiFi, a very comfortable king bed. Ended up with a great view which was a nice plus

Close to the shopping center, right on the ocean every room has an ocean view or partial ocean view, units equipped with almost everything you need, including surf board and fins small beach park right beside the condo great grills beautiful pool and ocean viewing area restful.

Really enjoyed our stay! Completely refurbished very modern and quiet rooms with comfortable beds and big flat screen TV. Restaurant is open air but inside and has a range of items and price ranges to suit every ones budget.

Condos  were okay but limited. The room was old, beat up and somewhat dirty. Took a shower, walked on the floor and bottoms of feet were instantly filthy. Unit also smelled awful. Not much good to say about unit. The owners should provide a clean unit at least.

An amazing resort for families. Close to a beautiful beach and some of the best hikes. Front desk are truly amazing. Great place to  set out on an adventure and then relax by the pool , spa or the comfort of your condo.

Dirt everywhere, dust on furniture, cold water, mosquitoes congregated asked for a broom so we could clean ourselves/never got it. Bedding for sofa bed did not arrive until last day not enough toilet paper. Horrible, horrible stay.
Elevator was broken.

Everything was great, except there was no safe in the room, and there were bugs in the room every night. Was expecting a balcony - which is somewhat unusual for Hawaii. Internet was fast. Parking was free. Staff was very helpful.
experience was average...attitude of front desk staff should have been better...check out man was nice

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: When me and my husband got into the room it was absolutely boiling. Broken A/C. On top of that the elevator wasn't working. Finally, the hotel didn't have parking but there were no clear signs indicating it. For the price we paid, our stay was absolutely horrific.

FUMING! We got transferred to another hotel. Front desk staff at new hotel was extremely rude and unhelpful.We did not like the new hotel. Booking agency was apparently meant to let us know ahead of time that this was going to happen. They did not.
Had a room right on the water. Just watch out for the cleaning fee they add at the end - It's not on the booking agency website.
Great location and well maintained units with nice staff - good value.
Great beach park next to the hotel. Worth it if travelling with kids due to the large playground. Very quiet

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Great location but not a fan of the accommodations. A/C was dirty and loud.

Great location, friendly and extremely helpful front desk, and stunning property. Tanya at the front desk was awesome! Everything is amazing right down to the decor. This is truly the place to come to relax.
Great location, within walking distance to the shops and downtown
great stay. Very convenient. lots of parking. 2 blocks from downtown.

Awesome stay. Was here for two weeks. The condo was spacious and air conditioned. the bedroom got a little stuffy since the main air unit is in the living room. one of the only properties with on site access to a beach.
Awesome view
Had a great time there this summer. This hotel is very close to the beach and to major restaurants, shopping and cinema

Had an efficient check in process and quick. We got a ocean view and it was amazing that there was nothing in front of our window blocking the ocean. Our door was very close to the pool and the beach just a short walk away. All the rooms have just been remolded and very clean and tidy. The restaurant and bar area was very nice as well. Self parking is convenient and close.

Hotel was disgusting and filthy. We had to clean room before we could get into bed. Everthing was covered in dirt. Garden view was view of a wall. Arrived late at night no reception, no security just phoned a call centre to be given entry code. Operator did not even know where apartment was so we spent an hour walking around to find it. Answer machine had message on it from environmental health responding to previous complaints.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: I booked this hotel for mid September months ago. In early September, I called this hotel to find out more about the bathroom size - they said it was handicap accessible. It was tiny when I arrived!
I would expect that the Jacuzzi would be hot (or at least warm) - it was not. Very disapointed with my stay..

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: I hesitate to share negative experience on the internet, but in this case I simply feel obligated to. This hotel is a total trainwreck. We do not live in the area and like most travelers must make reservations at hotels based upon hotel websites and reviews. Their website inaccurately advertised clean updated and modern and it was none of those things.
I liked the incredible landscape and well cared for neighborhood. We had a good time

I love coming here for an annual visit. The views are breathtaking! It is a wonderful place to have a full kitchen, laundry and apartment style feel. Disappointed with neighbors. Never have we encountered so many kids playing without supervision.

I really enjoyed my suite here. The location is walking distance 0.2 miles to the main part of downtown Kona. The pool and hot tub were lovely. Loved the view from my luani too of a beautiful sandy beach next to the building. Highly recommend this suite for affordable (170/night) in Kona housing.

My brother is a long time owner with 2 timeshares for the first Saturday in July. This year he only needed one, and was nice enough to offer the second to me. I'm very happy I went. My condo was in building 2, on the second floor. Really enjoyed the stay

I was charged an additional 120 at check in for a cleaning fee. At first the front desk said 160 and after I said no, she "spoke" with someone in the back room for 5 seconds. This room was paid in full and we could not get a refund. If I didn't pay, I wasn't getting the room. With three small children, I simply had no choice. Would never stay there again.
I was not made aware of extra daily cleaning fees. room was meh, needed upgrades- shower door was barely functioning.

I was worried that its location was too close to the airport, but we didn't hear any planes so there was no need to worry! Great location! The beach in front of the hotelhas great swimming and snorkeling for begginners in what they call the Ponds.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We stayed for two weeks in unit 325. One bedroom and one bath condo. We received a goof price for the length of our stay. However the unit was very loud and old looking and dirty.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: If you want Waikiki on a hometown beach budget this is your place! Bathroom was awesome!

lNeeds refurbishment. The Bathmat was folded nicely on towel rack, concealing a huge stain front and center. Things were broken like the lamp shade in the bedroom. It did very little to contain the light from the bulb. Paint was peeling off from the overhead door jam to the bedroom. The odor when you walked in was heavily antiseptic. I would not recommend this facility for anyone looking for a nice place.
It was very nice and comfortable.

It's a decent place to stay. Each unit is individually owned. I've stayed here 4 times and all 4 units seem to be comparable to each other. Amazing location, though. Right next to the beach and walking distance to town.

Kona is a veryvirbant area  and the condo was a good location for walking to shopping, dining, and other activities. Amazing ocean view with all the expected conveniences in the room. No housekeeping for our stay of 6 nights, but in-room washer/dryer kept us provided with clean towels/linens as necessary.

Very impressed! We got in late and so we would like to have a quick check in and get all the tips and information later when we're rested! Rooms were a bit humid though but beautiful design and setting, even for being in the middle of construction!

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Loved the beach and service
Loved the view from my room. Staff was helpful.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: My family and I ( wife and three kids) along with my parents had the pleasure of staying in the gorgeous Hawaiian home from Sep 10-20. It was a beautiful second floor access with stunning views of the ocean from almost everywhere in the suite.

My request of 3 adults in a room was never acknowledged so we changed hotels. After fumbling through the reservation, the front desk staff figured out a way for us to stay in the same room for the same price. Very satisfied with the room and everything else. booking agency needs to get better at communicating.
Nice hotel, bit of construction going on but it didn't bother us.
Nice place, good location of condo with all the amenities.
No surprises. Very well run and welcoming. Recent refurbishment tastefully done.

Not the most comfortable room, but had plenty of appliances like a dishwasher, microwave. Breathtaking view, great pool facilities. Charged extra for house keeping, but did little for it. Expected you to remove trash, no fresh towels w/o additional payment. Location was somewhat noisy.
Front desk not very helpful. Inadequate parking. Room needs refurbishment
Old looking, but location was awesome. The cleaning fee is quite a lot.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Not the newest property but it is very clean - why not modernize the bedding? It is the best location-in my opinion-with everything from awesome dining to 2 blocks walk to public beach (with beachside drinks/snack shack). Love the 7-8 food truck court just one block away on Beachwalk
Older unit could use some refurbishment but close to downtown. Would up grade to ocean view second floor

Our Condo was at the very back and it was probably the worst location in the complex . It is situated on a very noisy street and faced the road despite being promised a beach view. You would need a telescope to see the ocean from where we were. The view once we stepped out the front door was of cement stairs.

Our room was on the ground floor, facing the ocean. Great view. The lobby was beautiful- no walls. Breakfast was a good price, regardless of buffet or cook to order. Bike rental was a nice touch and awesome for getting around. The evening cocktails as a nice way to socialize. The staff was super helpful and welcoming. Will definitely stay again. Free laundry was a plus.

Picked this resort mostly due to price. Traveling with two kids made having a kitchen for breakfast very convenient . Condo had a washer and dryer in it which was a pleasant surprise as most places don't have that.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: What I liked: Location! It is on the main strip, next to some nice restaurants so lots of food options. Walking distance to the beach and Hard Rock Cafe. Room size is decent. What I didn't like: In major need of a renovation! Very outdated and the elevator stinks. Wifi connection is poor. Overall, would stay here again.

Positives - Great access to beach and park. Good location and ocean view Negatives - Cockroaches, bugs, fleas and unfriendly front desk (Except one person Phil who was trying to help) -1 laundry machine for whole hotel - mediocre restaurant with no easy access to pool - no room service for food - In general lack of access to food - Early check-in even... More
Reserved a  king room with ocean view. Was given a queen bed with a view. Notified desk was given a king room with an unimpressive view of the tennis court and parking lot.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Amazing Japanese restaurant downstairs. The hotel is walking distance to all the necessary amenities. Its quite hidden, but had an amazing view

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Rooms were acceptable, basic but a decent size, older style. No major issues. The beds were very comfortable. Good size kitchenette. Great location. Nice pool. Wifi was only free down in common area which was pretty much completely outside so not fun when raining. And it wasn't the greatest wifi. Bathroom was amazing!
Short walk to the park. Hotel went through recent renovation. The rooms were tidy and spacious. Most of the furniture and fixtures were new. Bathroom was very spacious. Shower was clean and huge!

Simple yet comfortable and welcoming one bedroom apartment by the beach well within the walking distance from most Ali'i drive places. Price-wise all things were very much okay. Well, the dishwasher broke but those things just happen every now and then. The housekeeping could wash the floors and esp. the balcony floor a bit more thoroughly. All in all, a very pleasant and easy stay.
Someone please do something about the A/C unit. It is dirty and gross!!

Stay was average. Front desk staff was a bit useless, came equipped with lots of excuses. Printer not working, computer froze check, in paperwork not ready. Ask for late check out not entered in computer so lots of confusion on our last day.
staying for 3 nights was average but for a whole week stay would not be pleasant. Would not come back.
Terrible view from my $450 a night room…

The A/C in my room was broken but fortunately they managed to find another room for me. Three other families in our group had booked the villas on the property and on their third day they were told they had to move into the hotel as the parking area in front of the villas was going to be paved. Despite knwoing this fact, the hotel scheduled them in anyhow and made them spend nearly a whole day of precious vacation time moving. Unacceptable.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: The accommodation is basic but you will have money left over for shopping and sightseeing. Pool was very very small

The  resort is in a fantastic location, and has great amenities and is very safe. Unfortunately, when we arrived, our condo's floor was very dirty, and did not look like it had been cleaned in quite a while. We asked to have a mop and bucket so that we could clean it, and it took them 6 hours to find one. The service lacked professionalism.

The  resort is in a fantastic location, and has great amenities and is very safe. Unfortunately, when we arrived, our condo's floor was very dirty, and did not look like it had been cleaned in quite a while. We asked to have a mop and bucket so that we could clean it, and it took them 6 hours to find one. The service lacked professionalism.

Condo was ok. The ocean view was incredible. But we were lured into booking for the free parking and wifi. We were never able to log into the internet. Several light bulbs weren't working. The wall unit A/C did not cool the bedroom down. The biggest surprise was when we were hit with the 150 cleaning fee for our 4 day stay. Re-checking the hotel info, it is listed on the very bottom of the page - we just hadn't scrolled down that far... Won't be making that mistake again!!!
The suite was excellent, spacious, comfortable, exquisite decor, breathtaking view, helpful, friendly staff. I would stay here again and again
The villa was amazing ! It was a little close to busy Alii dr so a bit noisy, but other than that .....fantastic !! Comfortable bed, big kitchen , awesome sunsets ! True value for the money !!

The suite was awesome. We did not have much interaction with the staff. We did sleep on the queen size sofa bed in the living room instead of the queen size bed in the actual bedroom due to the temperature. It was very hot and humid. The air conditioner in the living room does not cool off the bedroom. This suite is very close to shopping and dining. After each day of adventures we would walk to dinner at different joints. I will stay here again when I return.

The villas are individually owned so the décor, design etc is up to the owner. In our unit the furnishings were serviceable but in need of an update. The remote for the air conditioner, the wifi, and tv in the bedroom did not work.

The construction work is almost over. The grounds are still a little bit mud. The lobby was done up and lovely. Our room was updated although the common areas were not quite finishd yet. The location is amazing, our room had a beautiful ocean view.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: The entrance to the hotel is hidden away and between two retail stores. You could easily pass by it on the street and miss it.

The hotel had been completely done up to modern and beautiful rooms. The hotel was still under construction at the pool however this didn't impact our stay too much. Hotel is quiet and geared towards business or a place to sleep versus somewhere to spend a lot of time.

The hotel was very well located, with great views of the ocean and beatiful sunsets. The condo was average, not quite the condo I was expecting when I booked this trip. The faucet in the bathtub had a constant leak . It almost seemed that every time we went to the front desk they were closed or out (even when the sign said open 9-4). However these were minor issues that did not deter from our vacation very much.

Awesome location, right in the center of downtown Kona, near the beach, restaurants, etc. The apartment is spacious for a stay of a small family or couple. The laundry is on site including dryer and washer. This is the plus when I decided to book this property. My only complaints are the noises in the early morning when businesses load their goods and the hidden fee of cleaning service. It was indicated on the confirmation page that additional fee of 70 will be charged by the hotel at check in/out. However, the hotel only informs me at my arrival that since I am staying more than 2 nights, so the additional fee will be 150 instead of 70. Very disappointed

The location of the resort is excellent. You can walk to all of the amazing restaurants and bars. They have a beautiful swimming pool, jacuzzi and a great outdoor BBQ cooking area which we used a ton.

We were booked into an absolutely awful room. The wifi didn't work so I couldn't get on line to see what the problem was. The room was noisy and poorly furnished as well as dirty. The clerk on duty the next morning moved us into a room comparable to what I had booked. From what I can tell, I am out the difference in price between a street view and and ocean front room.

The overall facilities were ok. Bed not very comfortable and air conditioner was in living room so bedroom was a bit hot at night. Kitchen was set up well with everything stocked. Nice to have washer and dryer. Parking near our unit was a bit full. The staff at the hotel was excellent and friendly.

The good: very close to downtown and as promised, on the coast. There is no beach, but the volcanic rocks below our room housed all sorts of beautiful marine life. The not so good: Old, hard beds. The air conditioning was a wall unit and did not reach into the bedroom.
The room was ok, but the bed was not comforable at all. We actually slept on the sofa bed one night - it was more comfortable than the bed.
The room was pretty much underground. It was full of mosquitoes and bugs which we were constantly trying to get rid off.

The room was for the most part comfy . Beds were comfortable and spacious. Service was friendly. Free drinks everyday was a higlight! The only cons for me were 1. There was some old food left on the dresser,disgusting and 2. The AC , it cooled the room but did not keep the humidity out.
The staff was very helpful and accommodating. The room was clean and recently refurbished.
The Staff was outstanding and the service was awesome.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: The front desk staff was really friendly and very helpful. If you are looking for somewhere to stay for the value of your money (esp. if you are on a budget) then its the right choice. Its got FREE wifi, a kitchenette (fridge, microwave and cofee-maker and eating utensils, plates and cups). The housemaids will provide Hawaiian coffee everyday and housekeeping.
The stay was amazing, staff was so helpful, excellent service . The coffee and tea in the lobby was great.
The stay was ok but you would think for the price that breakfast would be free.
This resort is very close to downtown so that walking to and from is not a problem at all. There is lots of parking spaces and and they are wide enough to accommodate bigger pick ups.

This hotel has had a bunch of its rooms recently redone. The building itself looks quite old still, the elevator sounds and looks like it's about to fall apart and at one point I think it was even broken. However the rooms inside are quite modern, comfortable, tidy.

Amazing location- the resort has a beautifil ocean view. The rooms are very big and are equipped with a full kitchen which is helpful, especially if you don't want to spend a lot of money eating out every day.
This hotel is on the beach and the swimming for children and adults is magical. It was like walking around in your own personal aquarium. We saw incredible fish without even having to go diving.

This is a older property, the rooms are done up but unfortunately the windows doors and ac units are very old. Some rooms not to clean already. Restaurant ok and Internet is good. Fee too high for a non resort hotel. It's not really a resort hotel like you expect. Should be fee not resort fee.

This is our fourth stay at the hotel. We stay here every time we are on the big island. It is a great location, just off the main strip, right on the ocean. The views are incredible, the kids love the swimming pool. We love this place.

This place had everything we were looking for. Room was spotless and tidy...not fancy but certainly met our needs. Had a great view of the ocean from the living room and the lanai and yes, we did see whales from our room which was awesome

This years marked our 3rd trip to the island and each time we've loved our stay at the resort. We've even purchased three weeks so that we could extend our stay. This year was the loudest stay. We had very loud neighbors, which into our second week was getting unbearable.
Errrrr. Kids. Nope.  No kids?  Great!!!  Hot tub time!

We had a leaking toilet that leaked water everywhere. We reported this to maintenance and they told us they resolved the issue. Ultimately they tried to repair the leak three times and it still was not fixed when we left. However, we did get compensation for it. Otherwise, I would rate the condo higher. This is our favorite place to stay in the area

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: Disappointed by the unwelcoming entrance to this establishment. Not impressed.

Very relaxing. Currently construction is ongoing. Enjoyed the veranda for morning coffee. Easy access to many island activities. Our time at the resort way great and we made many memories. Will return some day.

Was only there for two nights, but the room was big and nice and had an awesome veiw. Wish we could have stayed for a full week. Easy after hours check in, but could have been explained better in an email or at the front office.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We wanted to spend 2 weeks in Maui so we booked this resort. We chose this condo, Unit 324, because it is on the first floor, amazing location, 2 bed/2 bath, and had good reviews. The condo did not disappoint and was exactly as described. We took long walks along the beach and went swimming and surfing. Loved our stay.

We booked a 1 bedroom + loft at the resort which was more than comfortable for the three of us (one couple and a friend). The beds were very comfortable! Which is good, since we spent most of our Kauai vacation getting muddy and bruised on the crazy hiking trails. The breeze was wonderful and weather was perfect.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We booked this unit online and stayed for three weeks. The owner was very helpful and answered all emails immediately. The unit has an amazing view but is kind of basic - needs some updating and maintenance to make it feel more like a home. There are beach toys provided, and plenty of towels. There is air conditioning but it's very loud.

This hotel was perfect for us. Our patio opened onto the pool and the ocean was just beyond that area. We loved being there. The staff were helpful, and the cleaning staff were equally wonderful. We would stay here again.
We had a 2 bed condo. It was clean, had a great kitchen, two king beds, and a sofa bed.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: We stayed for one night in this hotel on Sept. 26. 2018. It was the worst hotel I have ever stayed in (and I have stayed in some pretty awful places). Upon arrival we discovered that the elevator was broken. I was traveling with an elderly gentleman and we had to walk to the 4th floor.

We were woken up by A/C issues at 4 in the morning. The front desk offered to change rooms but I wasn't going to move at that hour so we had to sleep with the window open. Unsatisfied with customer service. I will be advising others stay away at least until the construction is done in December 2018
we had an amazing  experience with the big Island, not so much with the hotel.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We have stayed in this resort before, but had a not so great experience in this unit, which was marked as worth the extra expense because was recently refurbished. Turns out it was still getting painted - we had painters outside our front doors for the whole week. The smell and noise was horrible. 1.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We just returned from spending 3 weeks at the resort . We were traveling with 8 people so the four bedrooms, two bath units was perfect for us. (We had all ages ranging from 5-65). We had condo number 200 which we loved.

We loved the 3 weeks there. The pool and grill amenities are great and kept very clean. The cleaning service every three days was good and the in apt washer drier really made it comfortable to stay on top of the kids clothes.
We loved the  area as a base camp. Very close to the incredible Hanalei valley and village. Very convenient to cruise on the breathtaking coast. Would recommend!

We only stayed two nights. Did not expect as good of a view as we got, amazing ocean view. Room was basic but served our needs. A long block to all of the shops/restaurants of the city. The only bad thing is that we stayed only two nights, but when we booked on booking agency I did not see that it had a cleaning fee - this was very hidden away and surprised us.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We spent 14 days in unit 407...the property is well equipped and located in a quiet area. Plenty to see and explore. The sunset was amazing and the resort is close to down town. However.... this unit was not the best example, very dirty and loud.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: We spent 3 weeks in this hotel due to the cost of the the normal hotels we stay at were triple the normal cost. The location of this hotel is GREAT, it has a nice good size flat screen TV with cable/Sat TV, and both beds were actually very comfortable - at this point there is nothing else that I could have asked for.
We stayed at the resort for two weeks in August, and what a great place to stay! Friendly, helpful staff combined with great location, great amenities. We couldn't have been more happy.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: We stayed here for about a week in June 2018. We checked in with no problems and were given a key that would allow us to use the elevator and access the stairs. The elevator is a little bit sketchy but we never really used it (only for when we arrived with all the luggage and for when we left). Overall would recommend.

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: We stayed here for over 2 weeks as we have just moved to the area and had to sort a permanent place to stay. The front desk were very friendly and went out of their way to make sure they had a room for us and worked with us during our stay - as we didn't know when we would... More

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We stayed in unit 103 and we liked it a lot. It was tastefully decorated and well stocked. The kitchen had everything you might need and more. The washer and dryer were large and worked well. The bath was spacious and had tub and nice shower. The bed was comfortable. The view from the lanai was great.

We didn't want to eat out so we stayed in a condo. It was note well stocked,only had dishes and pans. No salt, pepper, or other essential cooking supplies. The bed pillows were awful. There was no air in the bedroom so it was hot and stuffy even with the ceiling fan on. Expected more for the price

We stayed in a two bedroom and loft unit. I did not expect the unit to be so spacious, but it could easily fit 10 people. The room we stayed in was newly done up, which was awesome. They said they were in the process of renovating the entire property. Would come again.

categories: Condominiums,Condominium & Townhouse Rental & Leasing,Hotel & Motel Management,Vacation Homes Rentals & Sales,Real Estate Management,Hotels,Lodging,Condominium Management,Motels
Guest Comment: We stayed in unit 34 (a two bedroom). It was ok, mostly tidy but had worn down furniture and needs a good update done to it. But the view was outstanding. They moved us to unit 1505 (a three bedroom). It was filthy and outdated very badly with bugs all over inside (especially when it rained). Horrible experience.

We stayed in room 206. The unit is ocean front which is great. The unit itself was kind of run down -  worn out tub and shower, general 60s feel throughout. After a few minutes of walking around barefoot, the soles of our feet were dirty and so we cleaned the floor with a cloth. The cloth we used became immediately brown from the dirt. The main bed was fine but the sofa bed folded out sloping the frame was bent and so making the mattress sloping downwards. Great location for the room but not much positive other than that.

We stayed there for a week and the amenities were great. The front desk and cleaning staff was very friendly. The room was tidy, comfortable and with a kitchen well stocked to cook just about anything you want. It is within walking distance of shopping and dining options. My only negative is that our room was street side and very loud. When you make reservations definitely specify a room away from the road.
We were there for ony 2 days. Great beach next door to watch the fish and turtles. Didn't use the pool because the sea is better. Rooms were nice. Location is walking distance to Kailua.
We're definitely staying here again on our next visit to Kauai!

categories: Vacation Rentals,Resorts & Vacation Cottages,Vacation Home Rental,Hotels,Hotels & Motels,Apartments,Apartment Operators,Resorts
Guest Comment: When we had reserved this hotel we had emailed in advanced asking if we could store out bags while we went camping, they seemed to have no issues with this, until we arrived. When we asked where we would keep our bags the lady insisted we must have been confused even after we had shown her the email stating that it was ok. Very unhappy.

Splendid place to just relax, not much to do around the area its a good 30 min walk to anything of interest. Really enjoyed the fully ready unit including kitchen. Adored the grills next to the pool area, got to cook eat and enjoy swimming.
Old hotel, and ugly apartments. Location was the only positive. Staff not very friendly.
There is no facility closer to the waves. Loved listening to the waves crashing all night long. Surfers in the water by 7am
Construction  is underway. The lobby is fantastic and the rooms very cozy. The pool is small but with a fantastic view. The front desk on the whole was welcoming.
